speaker: Freddie
dialog: Hey Jose how have you been?

speaker: Jose
dialog: I've been alright Freddie, how are you?

speaker: Freddie
dialog: I've been better, We need more friends!

speaker: Freddie
dialog: We are robots so technically we can create one right?

speaker: Jose
dialog: Lets have the player help us.

speaker: Freddie
dialog: Perfect lets put them to work.

speaker: Freddie
dialog: First we should decide what characteristics our new friend should have.

speaker: Freddie
dialog: Now we will ask you a series of questions so you can create our new friend.
